Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count 
FROM master_products 
WHERE active = true
GROUP BY category 
ORDER BY count DESC;
")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM master_products;")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Correct count mismatch between summary stats and failed items display

The summary stats were using API-returned counts (totalItems and failed) which
didn''t match the actual items being displayed. This fix calculates counts from
the actual item arrays (matched, created, failed) to ensure consistency.

- totalItems: Now calculated as sum of matched + created + failed items
- Failed count: Now shows failedItems.length instead of API''s failed property

This ensures the dashboard always shows accurate counts matching what''s displayed
in the tables below.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT ''Database Status: OK'' as status, COUNT(*) as total_venues FROM venues;")

Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_products,
  category,
  COUNT(*) as count_by_category
FROM master_products
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY count_by_category DESC;")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_master_products FROM master_products;")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Expand master products database with 510+ new bar items

Added comprehensive product catalog spanning 14 categories:
- Spirits: 70 Whiskies, 43 Gins, 41 Vodkas, 35 Rums, 36 Liqueurs, 29 Tequila/Mezcal, 22 Cognac
- Wines: 37 Red (Pinot Noir, Merlot, Cabernet, Shiraz, Rioja), 28 White (Sauvignon Blanc, Chardonnay, Riesling), 19 Sparkling (Champagne, Prosecco, Cava), 22 Fortified (Port, Sherry, Vermouth)
- Beer & Cider: 39 products across Lager, IPA, Stout, Cider with multiple sizes (330ml can, 500ml bottle, 20L keg)
- Soft Drinks & Mixers: 44 products (Premium tonics, ginger beer, juices, energy drinks)
- Bar Snacks: 45 products (Nuts, crisps, olives, cheese, charcuterie, dried fruits)

Database expanded from 668 to 1,178 products (+75%)

Features:
- Multiple bottle sizes per product (25ml, 50ml, 70cl, 1L, etc)
- Flavored variants (Tanqueray Rangpur, Bombay Distilled East, etc)
- Aged expressions (Macallan 12/15/18, Glenfiddich 12/15/18, etc)
- Wine varietals by region (Burgundy Pinot Noir, California Chardonnay, etc)
- Multiple beer styles with can/bottle variants
- Complete bar snack selection with various pack sizes

Benefits for invoice processing:
- Better fuzzy matching accuracy with 1,178+ products
- Higher auto-match confidence scores
- Fewer items requiring manual Step 4 review
- More accurate product identification from OCR

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d stocktaking_local -c "
-- Check for exact duplicates (same name, brand, unit_size)
SELECT name, brand, unit_size, COUNT(*) as count
FROM master_products
GROUP BY name, brand, unit_size
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
ORDER BY count DESC;")
